We’re Hiring: AI-Focused Developer (Data Migration & Backend Systems) – Fully Onsite/Hybrid/RemoteContract Duration: 2025-07 to 2026-06-30, Renewable depending upon your performance.Are you a developer with a strong Computer Science or AI background who thrives on building robust systems and ensuring data integrity? We’re looking for someone who can go beyond traditional testing—someone with real development experience who understands backend systems, data pipelines, and AI-driven architectures.About the Role:Join us in ensuring a seamless, high-quality data migration for our critical systems. You will design, develop, and implement automated validation pipelines, test backend services, and help us maintain the integrity of complex data structures and AI-enabled features.This role is fully onsite and ideal for someone who loves diving deep into data, backend logic, and automation—while collaborating closely with other developers to build rock-solid solutions.What You’ll Do:Develop and execute test cases for ETL processes to validate data consistency post-migration.Build automated testing pipelines (scripts and tools) for data migration, backend services, and APIs.Validate and ensure the integrity of complex datasets (user profiles, forum content, tags, etc.).Work with backend developers on system integrations (case management, reporting, CRM).Troubleshoot and resolve migration-related backend issues collaboratively with the dev team.What We’re Looking ForBachelor’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Software Engineering, or related field.Strong development experience (Python, Java, etc.)—not just testing.Knowledge and experience in AI or ML (ideally with experience testing or integrating AI components).Excellent SQL skills for database validation and data integrity checks.Experience with APIs, server-side logic, and tools like Postman, JUnit, PyTest.Ability to build or improve automation for validation/testing processes.Bonus: Experience with online communities (e.g. Discord-like forums) or data-heavy migration projects.Certifications in software testing (e.g. ISTQB) are a plus.Why Join Us?Tackle real-world data migration challenges with a talented team.Work onsite for close collaboration, rapid problem-solving, and strong team culture.Apply your developer skills to ensure our AI-enabled platform delivers flawless experiences post-migration.If you’re a developer who loves data, automation, and solving complex integration problems—especially in AI/ML-enabled systems—we want to hear from you!How to Apply: 📩 Send your resume and a brief intro about your experience in AI and development to You can reach me at pallavi@infotreeglobal.com Or simply DM me here on LinkedIn to start the conversation!

Hi everyone,I'm excited to announce that I'm seeking a new Software Engineer role and would appreciate your support as I take the next step in my career.I recently earned my Master's in Computer Science from Georgia Institute of Technology, with a specialization in Computing Systems. My academic projects have given me hands-on experience in designing and implementing complex systems, including a distributed file system in C++ using gRPC and a multi-threaded server in C.Professionally, I've been working as a contract Software Engineer, developing and validating code in Python, Java, and C++ to train AI language models. I thrive on building robust, efficient, and scalable software, and I'm proficient with technologies like C/C++, Python, Java, Docker, and Microsoft Azure. I am eager to apply my knowledge of computing systems and software development to solve new challenges.I am looking for a full-time Software Engineering or Systems Development role, and I'm open to remote, hybrid, or on-site opportunities in the greater Atlanta area and out-of-state. We’re Hiring: AI-Focused Developer (Data Migration & Backend Systems) – Fully Onsite/Hybrid/RemoteContract Duration: 2025-07 to 2026-06-30, Renewable depending upon your performance.Are you a developer with a strong Computer Science or AI background who thrives on building robust systems and ensuring data integrity? We’re looking for someone who can go beyond traditional testing—someone with real development experience who understands backend systems, data pipelines, and AI-driven architectures.About the Role:Join us in ensuring a seamless, high-quality data migration for our critical systems. You will design, develop, and implement automated validation pipelines, test backend services, and help us maintain the integrity of complex data structures and AI-enabled features.This role is fully onsite and ideal for someone who loves diving deep into data, backend logic, and automation—while collaborating closely with other developers to build rock-solid solutions.What You’ll Do:Develop and Hi everyone,I'm excited to announce that I'm seeking a new Software Engineer role and would appreciate your support as I take the next step in my career.I recently earned my Master's in Computer Science from Georgia Institute of Technology, with a specialization in Computing Systems. My academic projects have given me hands-on experience in designing and implementing complex systems, including a distributed file system in C++ using gRPC and a multi-threaded server in C.Professionally, I've been working as a contract Software Engineer, developing and validating code in Python, Java, and C++ to train AI language models. I thrive on building robust, efficient, and scalable software, and I'm proficient with technologies like C/C++, Python, Java, Docker, and Microsoft Azure. I am eager to apply my knowledge of computing systems and software development to solve new challenges.I am looking for a full-time Software Engineering or Systems Development role, and I'm open to remote, hybrid, or on-site opportunities in the greater Atlanta area and out-of-state. We’re Hiring: AI-Focused Developer (Data Migration & Backend Systems) – Fully Onsite/Hybrid/RemoteContract Duration: 2025-07 to 2026-06-30, Renewable depending upon your performance.Are you a developer with a strong Computer Science or AI background who thrives on building robust systems and ensuring data integrity? We’re looking for someone who can go beyond traditional testing—someone with real development experience who understands backend systems, data pipelines, and AI-driven architectures.About the Role:Join us in ensuring a seamless, high-quality data migration for our critical systems. You will design, develop, and implement automated validation pipelines, test backend services, and help us maintain the integrity of complex data structures and AI-enabled features.This role is fully onsite and ideal for someone who loves diving deep into data, backend logic, and automation—while collaborating closely with other developers to build rock-solid solutions.What You’ll Do:Develop and
